messages.message: All, this :point_up: is due to the billing endpoint failing at Microsoft’s end. We have escalated with them and progress is updated every hour in the channel <#C02EXMXP6L8|> if you’d like to follow. Meanwhile, if you start to see MS OCR failing in other internal sandboxes, please report here and let us know (the issue will start to show up with container restarts, and containers can restart for many different reasons)
